abilities.description: User stretches their leg and swings it in a wide arc like a whip to strike multiple opponents.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Muchi Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses his Gum-Gum Whip technique for the first time, demonstrating the versatility of his rubber body.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Luffy's Devil Fruit allows for more than just punching attacks.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that transforms the user's body into rubber, granting them elastic properties and immunity to blunt attacks.
